alert.note: Alert for Panola; Quitman; Tate (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 22 at 3:58PM CST until February 22 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Tate County in northwestern Mississippi... Northeastern Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Panola County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CST. * At 358 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sledge, or 14 miles northwest of Batesville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Senatobia, John W Kyle State Park, Sardis, Como, Sledge, Curtis Station, Pleasant Grove, Falcon, McGhee, Longtown, Ballentine, Locke Station, Horatio, New Town and Bluff. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
